mapper.sql: ID, APP_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_SEX, SOCIAL_NUMBER, DEGREE, MARRY, EMAILL, FIRST_WORKTIME, CHILDREN_NUMBER, ADDRE_REGIST, LIVEPHONE, LIVE_CONDITION, HOUSEHOLD_PROV, HOUSEHOLD_CITY, HOUSEHOLD_TOWN, HOUSEHOLD_STR, HOUSEHOLD_RIDGE, HOUSEHOLD_HOME, LIVE_PROV, LIVE_CITY, LIVE_TOWN, LIVE_STR, LIVE_RIDGE, LIVE_HOME, MONTHLY_INCOME, OTHER_INCOME, FAMILY_INCOME, MONTHLY_SPENDING, UNITNAME, INDUSTRY, UNITTYPE, DEPARTMENT, DUTY, ENTRY_DATE, IS_SOCIAL_SEC, UNIT_ADDRE, UNIT_TOWN, UNIT_STR, UNIT_RIDGE, UNIT_HOME, CREATEDBY, CREATEDON, MODIFIEDBY, MODIFIEDON, VERSION, OSS_ID, NCIIC_AUDIT_RESULT, IDENTITY_CARD_VALIDITY_PERIOD, ISSUING_ORGAN, QUARTERS_PHONE_REGISTRANT, QQ_CODE, WEIXIN_CODE, YIXIN, MATE_ADDRESS, MATE_ID_CODE, HOUSEHOLD_POSTCODE, LIVE_POSTCODE, UNIT_PHONE, UNIT_EXT_PHONE, POST_PROV, POST_TOWN, POST_CITY, POST_STR, POST_RIDGE, POST_HOME, UNIT_CITY, WORKEXPERIENCE, CAREER, PARTER_NAME, UNIT_WORKTIME, POST_CODE, UNIT_POSTCODE, MATE_MOBEL, MATE_UNIT, POST_STATE, HOUSEHOLD_ZHEN, LIVE_ZHEN, UNIT_ZHEN, EMAIL_SIGN, CAREER_TYPE, INDUSTRY_TYPE, EXPECT_GRADUATE_YEAR, UNITN_WEIXIN, PARTE_WEIXIN, PARTE_QQ
mapper.select: select c.app_id appId, c.degree, c.marry, c.emaill, c.household_prov householdProv, c.household_city householdCity, c.household_str householdStr, c.live_prov liveProv, c.live_city liveCity, c.live_str liveStr, c.unitname, c.unittype, c.unit_addre unitAddre, c.unit_city unitCity, c.CAREER_TYPE careerType, c.Customer_Sex customerSex, c.Unit_Str unitStr, c.Unit_Phone unitPhone, c.Industry_Type industryType, c.duty, c.Parter_Name parterName, c.Mate_Mobel mateMobel, c.Household_Town householdTown, c.live_Town liveTown, c.Unit_Town UnitTown from ln_app_cust_info c RIGHT JOIN bus_lnapp_batch_mapping m ON c.APP_ID = m.ln_app_id WHERE m.batch_no = #{batchNo}
mapper.insert: insert into ln_app_cust_info (ID, APP_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_SEX, SOCIAL_NUMBER, DEGREE, MARRY, EMAILL, FIRST_WORKTIME, CHILDREN_NUMBER, ADDRE_REGIST, LIVEPHONE, LIVE_CONDITION, MODIFIEDON, VERSION, OSS_ID, NCIIC_AUDIT_RESULT, IDENTITY_CARD_VALIDITY_PERIOD, ISSUING_ORGAN, QUARTERS_PHONE_REGISTRANT, QQ_CODE, WEIXIN_CODE, YIXIN, MATE_ADDRESS, MATE_ID_CODE, HOUSEHOLD_POSTCODE, LIVE_POSTCODE, UNIT_PHONE, UNIT_EXT_PHONE, POST_PROV, POST_TOWN, POST_CITY, POST_STR, POST_RIDGE, POST_HOME, UNIT_CITY, WORKEXPERIENCE, CAREER, PARTER_NAME, UNIT_WORKTIME, POST_CODE, UNIT_POSTCODE, MATE_MOBEL, MATE_UNIT, POST_STATE, HOUSEHOLD_ZHEN, LIVE_ZHEN, UNIT_ZHEN, EMAIL_SIGN, CAREER_TYPE, INDUSTRY_TYPE, EXPECT_GRADUATE_YEAR, UNITN_WEIXIN, PARTE_WEIXIN, PARTE_QQ ) values update ln_app_cust_info

FAMILY_INCOME = #{familyIncome,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MONTHLY_SPENDING = #{monthlySpending,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UNITNAME = #{unitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDUSTRY = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNITTYPE = #{unittype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTMENT = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUTY = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENTRY_DATE = #{entryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_SOCIAL_SEC = #{isSocialSec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_ADDRE = #{unitAddre,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_TOWN = #{unitTown,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_STR = #{unitStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_RIDGE = #{unitRidge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_HOME = #{unitHome,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEDBY = #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEDON = #{createdon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIEDBY = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIEDON = #{modifiedon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OSS_ID = #{ossId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NCIIC_AUDIT_RESULT = #{nciicAuditResult,jdbcType=CHAR},
IDENTITY_CARD_VALIDITY_PERIOD = #{identityCardValidityPeriod,jdbcType=DATE},
ISSUING_ORGAN = #{issuingOrgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUARTERS_PHONE_REGISTRANT = #{quartersPhoneRegistrant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ_CODE = #{qqCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIXIN_CODE = #{weixinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YIXIN = #{yixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATE_ADDRESS = #{mateAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATE_ID_CODE = #{mateIdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOUSEHOLD_POSTCODE = #{householdPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIVE_POSTCODE = #{livePostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

POST_RIDGE = #{postRidge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST_HOME = #{postHome,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_CITY = #{unitCity,jdbcType=CHAR},
WORKEXPERIENCE = #{workexperience,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CAREER = #{career,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UNIT_WORKTIME = #{unitWorktime,jdbcType=INTEGER},

PARTE_QQ = #{parteQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
